title: Tomato shallot vinaigrette
ingredients: ['60ml red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons red wine (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon white sugar', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '235ml olive oil', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh marjoram', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon', '3 shallots, minced', '180g tomatoes, diced']
